name: places/ChIJy0u5_qdYwokRBEJxREqfe6k
formattedAddress: 1599 Lexington Ave, New York, NY 10029, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1599 Lexington Ave, New York, NY 10029, USA

originalText.text:
Update: U-haul contacted me to rectify the situation. While I would book with U-haul again, I still would not at this location.

An absolute nightmare.
For starters, the app kept crashing and would not allow us to complete the check-in process.

The van was filthy, all of the vans in the lot were filthy. There were items inside from the previous renter, including moldy coffee cups in the cupholders. The left side mirror was broken, all 4 tires needed air, and many of the engine notices were on. We were unable to see the millage as all of the engine notices were displayed. The gas station attendants were reluctant to help, and simply watched us struggle. When we received the instructions on the app to pickup the keys inside we had to ask the attendants several times as they both refused to respond. They literally ignored us, until finally giving us the key.

The app only allows for 1 photo to be uploaded so we were unable to upload these photos at check-in.

We finally get out of the lot, we get home, park the van, load it up, and as we go to head to the new apartment we cannot turn on the van as the battery is dead. The van had been off and parked the entire time we were loading. We had to wait an hour for roadside assistance. I will say, roadside assistance provides us with great customer service.

We return the van and a taxi cab is blocking the uhual parking spots, while he is inside hanging out with the gas station attendant. They both clearly see us but the taxi cab driver does not move. We finally get the van parked and again we are unable to verify the mileage. The attendant is on a personal call outside by this point. He finally gets off the phone and helps us get the mileage reading.

It was a nightmare, in the 14 degree weather.

I reached out to U-Hail and received an email stating that upper management would reach out to me in 3 days. That was almost a month ago.

Save yourself the headache.

originalText.text: I picked up my U-haul truck here in the early morning using the 24/7 program. Although the tank was originally less than 1/4 full, the location had deceptively recorded it as completely full. As a result of this deception, I later had to spend between one and two hours on the phone with various customer service agents to eliminate an unwarranted fuel penalty.

text.text: I picked up my U-haul truck here in the early morning using the 24/7 program. Although the tank was originally less than 1/4 full, the location had deceptively recorded it as completely full. As a result of this deception, I later had to spend between one and two hours on the phone with various customer service agents to eliminate an unwarranted fuel penalty.

originalText.text: Honestly a great experience. I made a reservation for a van a couple of weeks ahead of time. Pick up was easy, I was on the road in 15-20 min. The van was nice it even had a back up camera and there were moving blankets and even a little rolly cart thing in the back. Drop off was easy too, the shop was closed but there was an attendant who helped me refill the gas to where I needed. The only thing I was worried about was when I was doing the return prompts on the phone it was charging me for fuel even though I returned the truck with the correct amount. However, there is an option before you finalize at the bottom of the screen you can push and it allows you to explain why you don't agree with the charges. I did that option and within 3 days I received an email with my receipt and it was all taken care of and I was charged correctly. If I ever need a moving truck again I will come back here for sure.

originalText.text: Very friendly staff. Pretty close to the subway 6 so easy to go pick up the truck

text.text: Very friendly staff. Pretty close to the subway 6 so easy to go pick up the truck

originalText.text: Boxes were about $3 more each than the prices on the site. Spent $50 on minimal packing materials, some of which were incomplete - glass pack kit came without the custom box and UHaul was unable to give a refund. Would not recommend.
